Detailed Description

Defines OpenGL's fog data.

We assume glHint(GL_FOG_HINT,xxx) is invoked outside MGFog. MGFog does not hold the GL_FOG_HINT attribute.

Member Function Documentation

draw GLAttribute process.

Parameters:
no_color if true, color attribute will be neglected.

Implements MGGLAttrib.
